As Hydras' extended his invitation to Cyclonus, and Scourge, Rodimus was su=
rprised for a moment, but then just leaned back against a support beam, his=
 arms once again folded across his chest. He was about to say some thing re=
ally clever about this when he thought he heard something . . . 

>"Rodimus=
."

Dark Rodimus jerked up. He was not sure what he heard,=A0but it sounded=
 like=A0some sort of ghostly whisper of his name. He glanced around . . .=
=A0

"What was that?!" Scourge said, instantly on the alert, his hyper keen=
 senses also keying in on the strange whisper. He whipped his disintergrati=
on rifle out and began to look around, his optics narrow and watchful. 

"W=
hat was what?" Cyclonus said, obviously unaware of the whisper, but he too =
grew more watchful, trusting Scourge's senses. 

>"This is Perceptor, We ma=
y have a posible intruder..." The Sgurity
>=A0Drones are released to start =
a search party"

"An intruder" Scourge almost hissed as he began to move ar=
ound the room, his weapon was once again drawn and ready. 

Rodimus, his=A0=
quarrel with Cyclonus and Scourge all but forgotten as this new situation d=
eveloped had already drawn his weapon as well. There would be time enough f=
or thier fight once this was over. 

"What is it?" Rodimus said, his voice =
tense but ready.

Scourge grunted, "I had it. It smelled like an Autobot" S=
courge continued to prowl around the room, his optics glowing as he probed =
different areas.

"Ahhhh . . ." Scourge squated down to run two fingers on=
=A0the ground and hold it to his nose, " . . . But he was here." Scourge ch=
uckled darkly. "And we shall find him, yes we shall, we have prey." 

> Hyd=
ras when he heard his security chief warning said "Every one take 
> a sear=
ch PArty and seek every inch of this base"

Cyclonus nodded as he watched, =
"Hydras, I shall help coordinate the seaerh from here."

Dark Rodimus glanc=
ed back at Hydras and then at Scourge and Cyclonus, "And I'm going to catch=
 that intruder!" His voice all business now. "Whatever it is we're going to=
=A0catch it, and dismantle it . . ." Rodimus=A0energized his weapon, " . . =
. The HARD way!"

Scourge stood up saying nothing,=A0looking off in the dir=
ection that his powerful tracking sensors told him=A0were small droplets of=
 lubricant, and his quarry. With smooth and whisper silent strides he took =
off at a jog,=A0followed quickly and somewhat more=A0loudly=A0by=A0Rodimus!=
